revised_title: Resonant Wave Triads Evolution and Exact Solutions
tldr: The authors present a class of exact solutions for nonlinear evolution equations of resonant wave triads. These solutions exhibit dependence on two spatial coordinates and time. They find that under certain circumstances, these solutions develop singularities or 'burst' after a finite time. The authors determine the criterion for the development of a 'burst' and explore the nature of the singularities that can develop.
